code:
%% Smart Traffic Management System - State Diagram (Mermaid)
%% Incident lifecycle

stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> Open
  Open: New Incident Reported
  Open --> InReview: Operator acknowledges
  Open --> Rejected: Invalid/Spam
  InReview --> Resolved: Issue cleared / verified fixed
  InReview --> Escalated: Severe or needs authority action
  Escalated --> Resolved: Action completed
  Resolved --> [*]
  Rejected --> [*]
repo_description: Smart Traffic Management System with OpenStreetMap
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
